name: Burial Chamber Trio
description:
'''Burial Chamber Trio''' is a [[drone metal]] band consisting of [[United States|American]] guitarist/bassist [[Greg Anderson (musician)|Greg Anderson]], [[Hungary|Hungarian]] vocalist [[Attila Csihar]] and [[Australia]]n multi-instrumentalist [[Oren Ambarchi]]. These three musicians are also performing with [[Sunn O)))]].

The band is not to be confused with [[Gravetemple]], which features the same lineup except Greg Anderson; instead, Sunn O)))'s other guitarist, [[Stephen O'Malley]], is in the band.

Burial Chamber released their vinyl-only self-titled album ''[[Burial Chamber Trio (album)|Burial Chamber Trio]]''. A 10-inch picture disc EP, [[WVRM]] (from a live performance), was also released through [[Southern Lord Records]].
